params.metadataUri: IPFS URI for extended metadata (images, descriptions)
params.question: The market question
params.resolutionTime: The timestamp when the market can be resolved

returns.market: The address of the created market contract
returns.marketId: The unique identifier for the created market

params.marketId: The unique identifier for the market

returns.marketIds: Array of market IDs created by the address

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.marketId: The unique identifier for the market

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

constructor.notice: Initialize the factory with the deployer as owner

createMarket(string,string,string,uint25.notice: Create a new binary prediction market

getMarketCount().notice: Get the total number of markets created

getMarketsByCreator(address).notice: Get markets created by a specific address

resolveMarket(uint256,uint8).notice: Resolve a market with the winning outcome
